benefits: Fresh apricots provide water-rich, low-calorie nutrition with vitamins A and C, fiber, and beneficial plant compounds. Their natural sweetness satisfies cravings while supporting weight loss through low calorie density. Fresh apricots have higher water content than dried versions.
